data.text:
Test yesterday and this mornin 🙌

😭 I'm glad it's no covid, but it looks like I'll be caring for a lad wae man-flu for the next few days 🙄😂 https://t.co/pChtqBctlr

@BogieOnPatrol 😔 whits fir ye willnae go by ye

Thankfully, we've just had wur second negative so it looks like hes actually just got the man flu 😬😂😂
